verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Worship the King! The one who died to free us The one who conquered death in victory Worship the King! The one lives forever He shall reign throughout eternity!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Darkness and gloom filled the earth. Satan was celebrating victory But Jesus arose! He is alive ! No grave could hold the King of Kings And the Lord of Lords! Worship the King!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Then every tongue shall proclaim He is the Christ, yes He is the Lord! Jesus arose, He is alive! No grave could hold the King of Kings And the Lord of Lords! Worship the King!{/lang-eng}
